name: Firefox Sliding Bookmarks Bar [Windows]
description:
Hides bookmarks bar by default for more browsing space.
Hover cursor over the navbar to slide out the bookmarks bar.

Alternatively, press Alt key to show both traditional menu bar along with the bookmarks bar.

Mac version link: style 48051
Mac (DevEd) Version: style 107598
additional_info: FOR WINDOWS FIREFOX latest (v33+) only for default theme. I do not guarantee proper functioning in older versions and/or customized environment. Supports maximized window. Does NOT support fullscreen mode. (Bookmarks bar will not appear when you hover) == Update Log == Updated 2015-08-21 :: optimized for Firefox 40.0.2 stable (Windows 10) Checked 2014-07-28 :: works fine for Firefox 31.0 stable Updated 2014-04-30 :: optimized for Firefox 29.0 stable 2015-08-21 Changelog - Code cleanup, now will work seamlessly in any version of windows and titlebar size. 2014-11-22 Changelog - Code cleanup, adds support for titlebar-on mode, fixed menubar mode. - Fixes toolbar flying when entering customization view. - Fixes toolbar covering download icon/bookmark icon effect. - Improved performance by switching animation to 'transform' instead of 'top'. - Added gif preview on userstyles.org
